document.full_text: goldman sachs  plans to raise up to 5 billion yuan ($770 million) for a private equity fund in china, a source familiar with the matter said on thursday.
document.title: goldman to raise up to 5 billion yuan china private equity fund
lines_and_colors: goldman sachs  plans to raise up to 5 billion yuan ($770 million) for a private equity fund in china, a source familiar with the matter said on thursday.
